game.name: echo//shredd
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: echo//shredd is a co-op survival horror game for 1-4 players in a dystopian future. Collect scrap, retrieve loot for upgrades and fight for your survival. Your life is a resource - and your commodification is part of the system.
